document_data.name: Enhanen
document_data.Activities: Enhanen usually recruited from his trusted veterans team, but newcomers were also welcome. Thanks to a proven team of trusted messengers, he could gather 100-200 recruits in two days.
document_data.History:
During his youth, he often traveled with his company in search of glory. His views changed over the course of his life to where he saw it as just a job.

In [[1358 DR]] he together with the [[Company of the Singing Dawn]] and the [[Llandrydd's Steel]] faced the [[undead]] army of the mad cleric of [[Tempus]] [[Theodoric]].
